scripts.move_dependencies: cp -r ./node_modules/katex/ ./dependencies/; cp -r ./node_modules/jquery-contextmenu/ ./dependencies/; cp -r ./node_modules/font-awesome/ ./dependencies/; cp -r ./node_modules/jquery/ ./dependencies/; cp -r ./node_modules/mathquill/ ./dependencies/; cp -r ./node_modules/ckeditor/ ./dependencies/
scripts.build_base: npm run move_dependencies; ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/index.js --standalone index > build/index.js
scripts.build_chrome: npm run build_base; cp -r ./build/* ./dist/chromeApp/codebase/build/; cp index.html ./dist/chromeApp/codebase; cp -r css/ ./dist/chromeApp/codebase/; cp -r ./dependencies/* ./dist/chromeApp/codebase/dependencies/
